      • isOnlineMode

        public boolean isOnlineMode()
        Whether the server is in online mode. When a server is in online mode, all players are verificated against the servers of Mojang. This will ensure all players have paid. When allowing unpaid users, the server is vulnerable to griefing and attacks.
        Returns:
        true if online mode is enabled; false if not
